(Comp. No.143053) Sub: Standard Operating Procedure (SoP) for revised Structure of F & A Units at ROs/PIUs and new PIU centric Payment & Accounting, System in NHAI- reg: As per the NHAI HQ Policy Circular No.3.5.9/2023 dated 04.10.2023 , the new payment system has been implemented accordingly. The Standard Operating Procedure (SoP) has been prepared for PIU level payment and accounting systems in NHAI is enclosed which will be in-force W.e.f.01.12.2023. 2 . This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above zovla3 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.)
